author: darthdc
title: Great little figure - thats all
review:
Ok, so here is the hero of the movie in his PJs. Got this as a freebie with the Daily Mail (via Toys R Us).

So, overall, not bad decoration for a figure. The stripe pattern is repeated on the back of the body, as well as on the arms and even on the sides of his legs.

He is also "two-faced", with the wink and smile expression that is shown on the packet, plus a cry baby expression on the other side. In my case, the latter face is positioned a little too low, so that the bottom of it is visible below the hairpiece.

Might have helped if it had an accessory of some kind, but it was a free figure.
